Kranti Acharya is a Research Associate at NCCS. She is a clinical researcher interested in cross-cultural issues in the assessment and treatment of cognitive-communication disorders, such as the reliability and validity of tests developed in English languages on the Nepali population.
She is a faculty member at the National Academy of Medical Sciences (NAMS), Bir Hospital, Kathmandu.
:::
